lyrics:
44 contributorsflight 22 lyricsintro
theres several exits on this aircraft in the event of an emergency
at this time please fasten your seat belts as we are preparing for take off and welcome aboard flight 22

verse  1
been a lot of places seen a lot of faces yeah
but nothing like you you you you
oh met you at the airport
flight 22 two two two
i want you to have it all ah ah ah ah ah
i want you to have it all ah ah ah ah ah
i wonder if you really know
what i do for you to have it
ive had it with the waiting and hesitating

chorus
so pack all your bags don’t gotta ask where were going to
don’t wanna be anywhere if it aint with you
nowhere in this world can compare boy thats the truth
to wherever were going on flight 22

verse  2
i know youve been patient thats an understatement yeah
but what can i do do do do
oh make myself look silly hoping that you hear me
all my girls say that im acting a fool
now touch me kiss me catch me or miss me
give it take it you cant mistake this
lets get away from it all
you might also likechorus
so pack all your bags don’t gotta ask where were going to
don’t wanna be anywhere if it aint with you
no where in this world can compare boy thats the truth
to wherever were going on flight 22

outro
take me all the way flight 22 baby
and baby were not gonna make it
at least im going down with you
our baggage might just be too full on flight 22
flight 22 flight 2215embed
